name: claude-transcript-viewer
description: A monorepo for Claude Transcript Viewer

scripts.test: npm run test:workflows && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:backend -- --watch & npm run test:frontend -- --watch
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:workflows -- --coverage && npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
